channel.title: PI How could I set the gameframe
channel.description: The source is Vistex. if anyone knows how to set the gameframe automatically for login to 474, that'd be nice. I changed the sprites to the older gameframe but the actual frame's buttons are 562. and the problem is, my cache i don't think has the older(474) sprites and idk if the client has the codes in there to use them. Does anyone have a tut they could send me, I tried this one and got 100 errors. http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/458411-pi-adding-525-gameframe-orbs.html

item.title: PI How could I set the gameframe
item.dc:creator: @justinmperry justinmperry
item.description:
@justinmperry wrote:

The source is Vistex. if anyone knows how to set the gameframe automatically for login to 474, that’d be nice. I changed the sprites to the older gameframe but the actual frame’s buttons are 562. and the problem is, my cache i don’t think has the older(474) sprites and idk if the client has the codes in there to use them. Does anyone have a tut they could send me, I tried this one and got 100 errors. http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/458411-pi-adding-525-gameframe-orbs.html
